Addon.name: Better Glass!
Addon.role: Are you tired of the same old glass textures? Do you want glass blocks and panes that look cleaner, borderless and feel connected? This is the texture pack you need!

Addon.name: Better Skyblock - The Map v1.5 (The 1.17 Update!)
Addon.role: Welcome to the most challenging Skyblock map you'll experience. You start off on an island with only a chest, grass block and a bedrock block.

Addon.name: Better Drowned Loot
Addon.role: Tired of looting tridents from drowned zombies but only drops often?

Addon.name: Minecon 2021 Mobs Add-on
Addon.role: In this add-on I added the three mobs for voting.I created this add-on a few days ago, but only today I managed to publish it, we already know who won,congratulations allay! but now you can enjoy all the mobs. Except for one, the bean already has similar functions to those given by minecraft, but I couldn't add them identical. I am working to improve them,but at the same time I am working on other add-ons and the next update for this add-on will appear later. For the functions currently added to the mobs, you can find them below in the description of each mob

Addon.name: Copper Golem Friend
Addon.role: This addon adds a copper golem, which was shown at Minecon 2021. Unfortunately, he can't press the buttons, but he will become a friend for you. Initially, he will be afraid of anything that can harm him. But if you tame him, he will be your protector and faithful companion.

Addon.name: M'Golem (V1)
Addon.role: Well Its quiet Easy to explain.This addon adds (13) New Golems into MC!These are quiet simple Golems but some have special abilitys and the better the Golem the Bigger :PSo welp Hope you enjoy! :)   Btw Turn on All experimental Gameplay Features  On

Addon.name: More Golems Remastered! (V2 Update!)
Addon.role: I've decide to remaster my old more golems addon. Have you ever wanted custom golems? Well your dreams has come true! This addon adds 10+ custom golems! Diamond Golem, Golden Golem, Emerald Golem, and much more!

Map.name: Better Skyblock - The Map v1.5 (The 1.17 Update!)
Map.role: Welcome to the most challenging Skyblock map you'll experience. You start off on an island with only a chest, grass block and a bedrock block.

Map.name: ArkCraft [Survival]
Map.role: ArkCraft is a magnificent world with many foreign places yet to be explored. There are lots of adventures and quests to take on in this brand new survival world. And the terrain is nothing like you would ever be able to experience in vanilla Minecraft. Find a way to survive either on your own or with your friends. Build a base, or use any of the already existing structures to make your own. Have fun surviving!

Map.name: 3D Animator Studio [Redstone]
Map.role: This is a creation which lets you view a preset 3D animation or create your own ones. It's actually much more immersive than a 3D movie seeing as you will be able to view the animation from multiple different angles. It's a fairly simple which doesn't last more than 10 seconds or so but it's still pretty cool.

Map.name: Two-Block Bridge
Map.role: This is the Bridge, on Bedrock Edition, with a two-block wide bridge. If you haven't heard of it yet, it is where two players try to score a goal on their opponent's side by crossing a bridge.

Map.name: Fast Bridging Trainer
Map.role: Do you like bedwars and skywars? I like. This map is for training bridging skills. There are three modes: onestack, straight and andromeda. If you have some questions ask me. I'll answer your question. I hope you'll enjoy this map.

Map.name: Bridge But Good!
Map.role: Bridge But Good!!! This map was made by Apsoma and Elementmax.

Map.name: Coffee Mango's Bridging Practice Map
Map.role: It's a bridging map! So there are two little floating islands, you have to bridge from the main one to the other, while you bridge, a timer (stopwatch) runs on the side of your screen! You can practice normal bridging, and staircase bridging, and now DIAGONAL BRIDGING! You spawn in the lobby, where you can choose what kind of bridging you will be doing!

Map.name: Two-Block Bridge
Map.role: This is the Bridge, on Bedrock Edition, with a two-block wide bridge. If you haven't heard of it yet, it is where two players try to score a goal on their opponent's side by crossing a bridge.

Map.name: Speed Bridge Help World
Map.role: The best way to get between gaps in Minecraft is placing blocks, there are ineffective ways to do this, but like anything there are effective ways like speed bridging, this world will help with all ways of speed bridging!

Map.name: Bridge Practice
Map.role: This is a practice map for bridging in minecraft and works  for players of all skill level. This will improve your bridging skills on servers and games such as bedwars, skywars etc.

Map.name: Arena PVP + Bridging Practice
Map.role: This map is an Arena PVP practice, a small arena with lots cover you can choose 2 kits: Netherite set + Netherite sword or Iron set + Iron sword. You can also practice bridging, god bridging, ninja bridging, etc.This map is an Arena PVP practice, a small arena with lots cover you can choose 2 kits: Netherite set + Netherite sword or Iron set + Iron sword. You can also practice bridging, god bridging, ninja bridging, etc.

Map.name: Fast Bridge Practice
Map.role: A single player world by Locura489 to practice your skills to run on walls and build bridges in different ways and quickly, so you can escape, save or chase someone without fail and always win.

Map.name: Craftzhie Bridging Academy
Map.role: What is going on everybody, It's me Craftzhie again. In this submission, I uploaded a map. This map is made in Indonesia. And also I used Void Lobby by CatAstrophe7777 to make this, Credit to him.

Map.name: Bridge Training (Easy)
Map.role: This is a world that you can bridge so you can become better at bridging in Minecraft, and you can even impress your friends and family members. This is a really fun map if you're bored.

Map.name: The Bridge of the Nether
Map.role: I am a Maps maker from Minecraft China, but it's the review is taking too long of a time time on Minecraft China (1 month), So I will try to upload it on this website.

Map.name: Coffee Mango's Bridging Practice Map
Map.role: It's a bridging map! So there are two little floating islands, you have to bridge from the main one to the other, while you bridge, a timer (stopwatch) runs on the side of your screen! You can practice normal bridging, and staircase bridging, and now DIAGONAL BRIDGING! You spawn in the lobby, where you can choose what kind of bridging you will be doing!

Texture.name: A Better Woody Taste
Texture.role: A Better Woody Taste is a texture pack made to give a big improvement to the look of the wood.

Texture.name: Better Shaders
Texture.role: BETTER SHADERS is meant to bring reality into your Minecraft Experience, It is Compatible with low end device and gives you a Smooth, lag free Gameplay.

Texture.name: Better Water
Texture.role: Better Water is a mini texture that changes the water to a best more transparent and clear, I hope you enjoy it :)

Texture.name: Piglingobrr+BetterNetherite
Texture.role: retextured as Pigmen mobs to look like bipedal classic pig mobs. This pack aims to make the pig mobs visioned as villagers before but are now textured to be in the nether. This pack also includes better netherite related equipment textures for MCPE.

Texture.name: Better Bricks - HD Texture Pack
Texture.role: Better Bricks is an HD texture pack that changes most all of the brick blocks. It improves brick, stonebrick, sandstone, quartz brick, and much more. This pack updates blocks to a 64x64 resolution which makes them much more clean and realistic. Enjoy!

Texture.name: Better Font
Texture.role: This is my first upload. All this does it change the font to something better on the eyes. Something a lot smoother and it works for any version of Minecraft. Please use this pack as you wish.

Texture.name: Bedrock Edition Defense Animation
Texture.role: Let's get firstperson defense animation! Wave your swords! This pack can work on all servers well , because it is just a resource pack! I offer multiple versions of the pack ，never have to worry about compatibility！

Texture.name: EPIC PvP Animations
Texture.role: Hello! I recently have been developing a PvP texture pack, and I added custom animations. However, some people didn't like some of the animations, so I decided to make this new pack that only modifies the animations.

Texture.name: Fixed Vanilla
Texture.role: This Resource Pack fixes some issues in the base game related to textures, models and animations, both default and classic textures are supported, Every fix is listed in the description.

Texture.name: Fixed Player Animation (Beta 0.0.0)
Texture.role: Have you ever been sick of Bedrock Edition's broken animations? This resource pack will fix the player animations! We'll keep trying to fix as many bugs as we can!Note: There may be a few bugs that are not currently present in vanilla. If you find a bug, we'd appreciate it if you'd contact us right away!

Texture.name: Custom Death Entities 2021 | Minecraft Addon (B)
Texture.role: Are you bored with Minecraft death Animation? Let me introduce you my new addon: 'Custom Death Entities Animatio'. This addon adds new animations when the Animals, Mobs or Monsters killed by player. Maybe some of you already know about this addon. This is my old addon from the past, created for Minecraft 1.12 - 1.13. Since Minecraft updated to the newest Version, some of features in this addon not working anymore and causing lot of bugs. But now, im decided to 'Remake & Rewrite' this addon to make it compatible with the newest Minecraft Version which have new format code version. If you didnt know about this addon.. This addon give an unique animations when you kill an entities in Minecraft

Texture.name: Custom Death Entities 2021 | Minecraft Addon (R)
Texture.role: Are you bored with Minecraft death Animation? Let me introduce you my new addon: 'Custom Death Entities Animatio'. This addon adds new animations when the Animals, Mobs or Monsters killed by player. Maybe some of you already know about this addon. This is my old addon from the past, created for Minecraft 1.12 - 1.13. Since Minecraft updated to the newest Version, some of features in this addon not working anymore and causing lot of bugs. But now, im decided to 'Remake & Rewrite' this addon to make it compatible with the newest Minecraft Version which have new format code version. If you didnt know about this addon.. This addon give an unique animations when you kill an entities in Minecraft

Texture.name: Leaf's Mobber Mobs
Texture.role: Mobbier mobs is a pack that 3D-ifies default mobs, including pigs, cows, bees, chickens, skeletons, and spiders, as well as gives them better animations. Easy to edit, customise, and integrate into your own packs.

Texture.name: Waving Leaves and Water! V5.1
Texture.role: Vanilla minecraft isn't that much lively but this pack will give leaves , plants, flowers,crops and water a waving animation which looks pretty cool and lively. It is also pretty FPS friendly so those who cannot use shaders should probably use this! Some of the blocks have a waving animation while others have flipbook animations. The waving stuff only works on mobile and the flipbook animations work on all devices

Texture.name: DomesticPets
Texture.role: DomesticPets is an add-on for your minecraft that adds new pets, from fish, to various breeds of dogs.

Texture.name: Console Aspects
Texture.role: This texture pack was created to make Minecraft: Bedrock Edition look, sound, and feel more like 4J Studios' Legacy Console Editions of the game. It changes things such as beds, music, and controller tooltips. If you're a player who moved to Bedrock after Console Edition was discontinued, you'll love this pack!

Texture.name: Animals Pack For Your Own Worlds (B)
Texture.role: Many people asked for a separate pack from our map to have only the animals, so here it is! All of our animals have special animations and geometry. Their breeding method is unique because they got pregnancy or lay eggs, but NEVER simply spawn a baby immediately. Most of them have special behaviors like a sleep routine based on the time of the day. Some also have gender specifications.

Texture.name: Animals Pack For Your Own Worlds (R)
Texture.role: Many people asked for a separate pack from our map to have only the animals, so here it is! All of our animals have special animations and geometry. Their breeding method is unique because they got pregnancy or lay eggs, but NEVER simply spawn a baby immediately. Most of them have special behaviors like a sleep routine based on the time of the day. Some also have gender specifications

Texture.name: Java Aspects
Texture.role: This texture pack was created to make Minecraft: Bedrock Edition feel, sound and look more like the original version of Minecraft called Java Edition. It changes things such as water, bees, and particles. Java Edition sounds are also included. If you're a big fan of Java Edition, you'll love this pack too!

Texture.name: Animated Skins
Texture.role: Minecraft bedrock edition has recently had an enormous growth in the cosmetics industry, mostly involving animated cosmetics and resource packs. This pack will be a great addition to your animated perks and features in game, especially since it animates the avatar of the player.

Texture.name: M Spawn Egg's and Craft's (Ender Dragon Egg, Wither Boss Egg and More) (B)
Texture.role: More spawning eggs for mobs and new mobs coming soon! You can spawn mobs that didn't(now it has) have eggs. only with this addon.

Texture.name: M Spawn Egg's and Craft's (Ender Dragon Egg, Wither Boss Egg and More) (R)
Texture.role: More spawning eggs for mobs and new mobs coming soon! You can spawn mobs that didn't(now it has) have eggs. only with this addon.
